lexUnit.name: ounce.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a unit of weight of one sixteenth of a pound avoirdupois (approximately 28 grams)

sentence.text: She paused a moment , turned and looked at the line of narrow drawers , read the label , then weighed out two ounces of loose tobacco .
